Attacks.Name: Thunderbolt
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Shock special condition.

Attacks.Name: Thunder Fang
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Double Kick
Attacks.Effect: This attack can be made twice in succession against the same target.

Superpowers.Name: Volt Absorb
Superpowers.Effect: When Jolteon is targeted by an Energy-type attack, it takes no damage and gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Agility
Superpowers.Effect: Jolteon immediately makes a long move.

Attacks.Name: Discharge
Attacks.Effect: This attack targets all characters within its area of effect. Characters damaged by this attack gain the Shock special condition.
